text.div:
serviceRequestRequesterIdentifierSearchParameter

Parameter requester.identifier:token

Searches for serviceRequest by the Practitioner identifier eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/ServiceRequest?requester:Practitioner.identifier={identifier}

ResourceServiceRequest
Expression(none)
Target ResourcesServiceRequest
MultiplesThe parameter cannot repeat or have multiple values

name: serviceRequestRequesterIdentifierSearchParameter
description: Searches for serviceRequest by the Practitioner identifier eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/ServiceRequest?requester:Practitioner.identifier={identifier}
